Search for specific interactions type (e.g. mutualism)

Source: R/search_interactions.R
search_interactions.Rd

Search for specific interactions type (e.g. mutualism)

search_interactions(type = avail_type(), expand_node = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

type

a character one of the interactions type available in the function avail_type()
expand_node

a logical. Should the function returned more information on nodes involved in the interaction? Default is set to FALSE, which means that only the mangal ID of nodes are returned.
verbose

a logical. Should extra information be reported on progress?

Value

An object of class mgSearchInteractions, which is a data.frame object with all interaction matching the interaction type provided. All networks in which interactions are involved are also attached to the data.frame.

Examples

search_interactions("competition")
#> Simple feature collection with 12 features and 20 fields (with 1 geometry empty)

competition_networks <- get_collection(search_interactions("competition"))
